marklogic.body:
Indeed he is a victim. And it is sad. As it means he is dead. Which is sad, because the judgement for it is that he took 7 lives. Which is sad. Because the judgement for that is that he was intoxicated with false informations. Graphic information. Word information.False information spread by his brothers.As the false Gaza photo published by the UN a few days ago, spread by Hamas Abbas. And all the weak minds following under reason behind. Â Shame on them. Make no mistake. He is the 8th victim of a Cold blooded killer.Here is a Zohar excerpt in memory of a young smiling man who did not make it right: "He does not know he is the Ax, in the hand of the cutter"
Kadish for all.Â
The rest, it is hatred. Which is the shadow of the Cold blooded murderer already looking for the next victim.
